<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/api/users/{emailAddress}/{selectedProvider}/waas"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets Coinbase WAAS token for user by email and selected provider.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"captcha","in":"header","required":true,"description":"Recaptcha value to pass.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"emailAddress","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"selectedProvider","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"JSON object containing sign in token","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"token":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
